CSVPATH = "/kaggle/input/world-happiness/"

def load_happiness_data(year):
    file_name = os.path.join(CSVPATH, year+".csv")
    return pd.read_csv(file_name)

happiness_2015 = load_happiness_data('2015')
happiness_2016 = load_happiness_data('2016')
happiness_2017 = load_happiness_data('2017')

# we notice the unusual naming of column names, change it 
# by replacing " " with "_" and lowercase only
def preprocess_columns(df):
    df.columns = df.columns.str.replace(" ","_")
    df.columns = df.columns.str.lower()
    df.columns = df.columns.str.replace("(", "")
    df.columns = df.columns.str.replace(")", "")
    df.columns = df.columns.str.replace(".", "_")
    df.columns = df.columns.str.replace("__", "_")
    df.columns = df.columns.str.rstrip("_")
    return df
happiness_2015_new = preprocess_columns(happiness_2015)
happiness_2016_new = preprocess_columns(happiness_2016)
happiness_2017_new = preprocess_columns(happiness_2017)
